title: Metalation of metal–organic frameworks: fundamentals and applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,5626-5676
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00873H, Review Article
Hai-Yu Li, Xiang-Jing Kong, Song-De Han, Jiandong Pang, Tao He, Guo-Ming Wang, Xian-He Bu
This review summarizes the recent research progress in the metalation of metal–organic frameworks, spanning the design principles, synthetic strategies, and potential applications.
